TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ObjectParameter extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents a query parameter that is passed to an object query.

span.span: Represents a query parameter that is passed to an object query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示传递给 或查询生成器方法的查询参数。Represents a query parameter that is passed to an or a query builder method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[查询生成器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). 对象参数由名称、类型和值组成。Object parameters consist of a name, a type, and a value. 此类不能被继承。This class cannot be inherited. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例向集合添加新参数。The example adds new parameters to the collection. 它循环访问 并显示集合中每个参数的名称、类型和值。It iterates through the and displays the name, type, and value of each parameter in the collection. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Parameters](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_parameters)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Parameters](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_parameters)]

span.span: The parameter name.

param.span: This name should not include the "@" parameter marker that is used in [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] statements, only the actual name.

span.span: This name should not include the "@" parameter marker that is used in [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] statements, only the actual name.

param.span: The first character of the expression must be a letter.

span.span: The first character of the expression must be a letter.

param.span: Any successive characters in the expression must be either letters, numbers, or an underscore (_) character.

span.span: Any successive characters in the expression must be either letters, numbers, or an underscore (_) character.

param.span: The initial value (and inherently, the type) of the parameter.

span.span: The initial value (and inherently, the type) of the parameter.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and value.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用指定的名称和值创建一个参数。This constructor creates a parameter from the specified name and value. 根据参数的值推断其类型。The type of the parameter is inferred from the value. 添加到 后，该参数名称不能进行更改。When added to the , the parameter name cannot be changed. 该参数值可以通过 属性进行更改。The parameter value can be changed through the property. 编译查询后，该值不能进行更改。After the query has been compiled, the value cannot be changed. 有关详细信息，请参阅[查询生成器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例向集合添加新参数。The example adds new parameters to the collection. 它循环访问 并显示集合中每个参数的名称、类型和值。It iterates through the and displays the name, the type and the value of each parameter in the collection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例化后，该参数名称不能进行更改。When instantiated, the parameter name cannot be changed. 该参数值可以通过 属性进行设置或更改。The parameter value can be set or changed through the property. 编译查询后，该值不能进行更改。After the query has been compiled, the value cannot be changed. 有关详细信息，请参阅[查询生成器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例向集合添加新参数。The example adds new parameters to the collection. 它循环访问 并显示集合中每个参数的名称、类型和值。It iterates through the and displays the name, type, and value of each parameter in the collection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 编译查询后，该值不能进行更改。After the query has been compiled, the value cannot be changed. 有关详细信息，请参阅[查询生成器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). 如果新值与构造函数中声明的类型不兼容，可能引发运行时异常。If the new value is incompatible with the type declared in the constructor, it might cause a run-time exception. 提供程序必须确定该值是否与声明的类型兼容。The provider must determine whether the value is compatible with the declared type. 例如，如果初始类型为 ，而新值为 ，则可能接收到异常。For example, if the initial type is and the new value is , you might receive an exception. ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例向集合添加新参数。The example adds new parameters to the collection. 它循环访问 并显示集合中每个参数的名称、类型和值。It iterates through the and displays the name, the type and the value of each parameter in the collection.
